comments:
When trying to import a utility jar into a pre-existing EAR I get the following error and stack:

An internal error occurred during: "Updating status for WebSphere Application Server v6.0..."

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Path must include project and resource name: /Calculator.jar
at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:62)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.newResource(Workspace.java:1571)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Container.getFile(Container.java:123)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.resources.VirtualArchiveComponent.getWorkspaceRelativePath(VirtualArchiveComponent.java:113)
at org.eclipse.wst.web.internal.deployables.ComponentDeployable.addUtilMembers(ComponentDeployable.java:350)
at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.deployables.J2EEFlexProjDeployable.members(J2EEFlexProjDeployable.java:193)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.ModulePublishInfo.hasDelta(ModulePublishInfo.java:293)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.ServerPublishInfo.hasDelta(ServerPublishInfo.java:348)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.hasPublishedResourceDelta(Server.java:1038)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server$2.visit(Server.java:176)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.visitModule(Server.java:2355)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.visit(Server.java:2339)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server$ResourceChangeJob.run(Server.java:185)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

The steps I have been using for the repro:

Import an war and add it to an EAR.
Publish the EAR.
Run jsp which fails as required utility jar is not present.
At the EAR level do an Import->J2EE Utility Jar->Copy Utility Jars into an existing EAR from an external location
After providing the directory and selecting the Jar clicking finish results in the above error. All subsequent publishes fail with the same error as well (in the .log).
Is it possible to get a target for this issue so I can set the expectations up correctly for the adopter product release? Thanks.

This looks like a duplicate of 173140 which has already been fixed in WTP 1.5.3

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 173140 ***

traces.message: Path must include project and resource name: /Calculator.jar
